Segment.name: B1
Segment.comment: To transmit identifying numbers, dates, and other basic data relating to the transaction set

Field.name: ShipmentIdentificationNumber
Field.comment: Identification number assigned to the shipment by the shipper that uniquely identifies the shipment from origin to ultimate destination and is not subject to modification; (Does not contain blanks or special characters)

Field.name: Date
Field.comment: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

Field.name: ReservationActionCode
Field.comment: Code identifying action on reservation or offering

Field.name: YesNoConditionOrResponseCode
Field.comment: Code indicating a Yes or No condition or response

Field.name: ShipmentOrWorkAssignmentDeclineReasonCode
Field.comment: Code indicating the reason for declining a shipment or work assignment
